[00:00.00]The Business (Vintage Culture & Dubdogz Remix) - Tiësto
[00:00.67]Lyrics by：Tijs Verwest/Julia Karlsson/Anton Rundberg/James Bell
[00:01.59]Let's get down let's get down to business
[00:04.86]Give you one more night one more night to get this
[00:08.39]We've had a million million nights just like this
[00:12.55]So let's get down let's get down to business
[00:16.94]Mama please don't worry 'bout me
[00:20.64]'Cause I'm about to let my heart speak
[00:24.72]My friends keep telling me to leave this
[00:28.26]So let's get down let's get down to business
[00:32.34]Let's get down let's get down let's get down let's get down
[00:36.26]Let's get down let's get down let's get down let's get down
[00:40.08]down down down down down down down down down down
[00:43.91]So let's get down let's get down to business
[00:46.18]
[01:03.40]Let's get down let's get down to business
[01:06.78]Give you one more night one more night to get this
[01:10.34]We've had a million million nights just like this
[01:14.58]So let's get down let's get down to business
[01:18.80]Let's get down let's get down to business
[01:22.18]Give you one more night one more night to get this
[01:25.78]We've had a million million nights just like this
[01:30.20]So let's get down let's get down to business
[01:32.91]
[01:34.01]Back and forth back and forth with the bulls**t
[01:37.64]I know I said it before I don't mean it
[01:41.26]It's been a while since I had your attention
[01:45.59]So it might hurt to hear this
[02:05.44]Dreams we have don't ever fall away
[02:09.32]We can't live 'em if we stay the same
[02:13.02]And I can't do this for another day
[02:16.86]So let's get down let's get down to business
[02:20.82]Let's get down let's get down to business
[02:24.13]Give you one more night one more night to get this
[02:27.76]We've had a million million nights just like this
[02:31.84]So let's get down let's get down to business
[02:36.20]Let's get down let's get down to business
[02:39.65]Give you one more night one more night to get this
[02:43.20]We've had a million million nights just like this
[02:47.41]So let's get down let's get down to business

[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.67]//
[00:01.59]让我们开始做正事儿吧
[00:04.86]再给你一个晚上 看你能否让我满意
[00:08.39]我们共同经历了无数个这样的夜晚
[00:12.55]所以 让我们开始做正事儿吧
[00:16.94]妈妈 请不要担心我
[00:20.64]我要开始说说心里话
[00:24.72]朋友总说我需要放弃
[00:28.26]所以 让我们开始做正事儿吧
